caption.p: Pathological lesions in samples of positive specimens detected by Reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction. (a and b) Non-suppurative myocarditis staining with hematoxylin-eosin (100Ã—). Perivascular edema, diffuse gliosis, satellitosis, neuronal death, demyelination. (c) Lymphocytic meningitis, non-suppurative viral type meningitis (d).
